content: i am a student working on mirth, my teacher assign me a task to convert some medical application non-standard data to standard data using FHIR standard. kindly help me how can i add more connectors and extensions like LLP e.t.c and guide me if you can in any manner. i shall be very thank full to you.

@gulraiz joyia This doesn't seem like a US-specific question. You might find a broader audience (and thus a faster response) if you posted it on the "implementers" stream. Your question could use a bit of clarification too. Are you looking for a general support site for how to use Mirth with FHIR?
thank you! @Lloyd McKenzie , i am going to post my question to implementers stream.
